ygData.subject: Re: Worth it to practice 1h blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: All this talk on practicing in 1H Blunt and seeing people use some of the rare and upper level piercing weapons has me thinking.. I ve been using a Worn Great
ygData.messageBody:
All this talk on practicing in 1H Blunt and seeing people use some of the
rare and upper level piercing weapons has me thinking.. I've been using a
Worn Great Staff pretty exclusively for the past few levels (Currently at 9)
and is it worth me continuing using the 2H Blunt style or should I give it
up in favor of 1H or Piercing? I've been doing fine using it with support
from my pet backing me up for melee. But are there better 2H Blunt weapons
down the road or should I invest quickly in a different weapon style to
insure I will have an interesting array of weapons in my future?

But then again someone's post stated that why are Enchanters even getting
near the high level mobs. So maybe I shouldn't be fussing over weapons since
I won't be doing melee later anyways.. Any thoughts?



- Random (Calamwen, Enchanter of Bristlebane)
Gairyu Isle ~ A Samurai Shodown Fanfiction Site
http://www.geocities.com/Tokyo/Temple/8818
